subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Rex Ryan, speaking at the A.F.C. coaches’ breakfast on Tuesday, perhaps played a game of semantics when he said that the Jets are not actively trying to trade cornerback Darrelle Revis.
snippet: Jets Coach Rex Ryan, speaking at the A.F.C. coaches’ breakfast on Tuesday, perhaps played a game of semantics when he said that the Jets are not actively trying to trade cornerback Darrelle Revis.
